name: Cube Shooter 2D [Prototype]
description:
What is this?

This is a 2D side-scroller bullet hell type game. I'm using the default square sprite unity gives you in almost everything you see. Yes, I am that lazy. 

How to Download

Download the zip file below. If your browser detects the file as "suspicious" or "dangerous" click the little arrow and press "Keep". Web browsers do this with unknown files  and will try and block almost all games on itch.io. This is 100% safe, you will not get a virus. After you've downloaded the zip file, Unzip it, and launch the .exe or "executive" file. Have fun! 

Track my progress

I've organized an itch.io page that I will be updating almost as soon as I complete something. You can use this to track my progress live!

https://trello.com/b/SpK1NYfM/cubeshooter
